title: HELP! Client updating and launching issues
body:
After the most recent update, 5.18 the leagues client has been playing up for me.
At first, it didnt want to launch the game after pushing the launch button. i could push it 20 times and nothing would occur
so i uninstalled and then reinstalled. This time, it didnt even install the game, it just showed the launch button and whenever you try and repair it does nothing!
PLZ help i have two weeks free and i am really interested in smashing out some games, but this launcher issue is just ticking me off.
Thank you for your response RITO in advance. 

-Tried restarting launcher
-Tried reinstalling
-tried restarting computer
-tried an older client installer (the na based one)(http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Installer/SingleFileInstall/LeagueOfLegendsBaseNA.exe)
-tried the force update

But nothing occurs, it sits blankly with the launch button mocking me!

(EDIT)

HP Pavilion Notebook
i5 2.4 ghz
8 gb ram
nvidia 830m 2gb
Windows 10

replies.body:
Hi,

When you reinstalled, did you do it per the [reinstall instructions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) on our support site?  It's super important to delete the old files after you uninstall - to make sure that everything comes back fresh.

Let me know how you go!

Mindstar
